# PED::GET_SYNCHRONIZED_SCENE_PHASE

## Summary
Gets the current phase of an existing synchronized scene

## Parameters
* **INT** sceneID: The scene index returned by CREATE_SYNCHRONIZED_SCENE phase - The new phase of the scene

## Returns
* **FLOAT**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Returns the current phase of the provided synchronized scene
